reviewText: Very nice, but the package arrived slightly damaged.  It was sold as new, but it looked like it had been opened and repackaged. It played with only slight jumpy moments.

The best.  Although, it would be to my advantage "if" there was a notation of whether either of these Hallmark Videos were in closed caption.  That would definitely be a plus for those of us needing such!
We enjoy watching movies with a story to them plus something we can watch with our grand children as well
When I saw this on Hallmark, I knew I had to have a copy for my own viewing and like all DVD I purchase I watch quite often.
Great Movies and excellent condition DVD's.  Hallmark Movies are generally timeless good video and these are no exception.  Looking forward to finding more bargains like these.

These 2 movies were to the wife and myself just really great not only for Christmas time veiwing but should be viewed anytime of the year,,,they are just that good. They simply great for family time viewing. My wife and myself highly recommend these 2 movies for families that watch movies together and also for those families who  don't watch movies together,, these 2 moves are just the reason for families that don't watch movies together to start watching them together.
